experience: You and Alan both know Jeff Lin, Curtis Barrett, and 8 others

Our focus is delivering full-cycle staffing solutions, whether that is short term, contract, long term, or permanent. We love our clients and we support them by placing quality people in the right position at the right time.TEEMA is governed by rock solid values, a mandate to empower our members and a commitment to excellence. We are passionate about what we do. Our clients have access to a wealth of expertise unsurpassed in staffing.
• Full-cycle recruiting• Placing high quality candidates in both permanent and temporary roles (Full-time & contract), primarily in the fields of Information Technology and Finance

• Created and maintained a company twitter account, and managed several social media accounts, resulting in an enhanced marketing platform• Worked with developers to design and launch company website, and was responsible for the continuous updating of content• Wrote press releases and contributed to marketing plans• Coordinated marketing events
